data.name: HyperLeague Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Utopia's endless dungeons are filled to the brim with untold riches, legendary armor, and monsters lurking around every corner to make sure you don't take any of it.



Form your party and battle waves of enemies to level up, upgrade your warriors, and collect new, more powerful gear. Each time you enter a dungeon you'll be stronger than you were the last time, but don't let your guard down - the deeper you go the more ruthless the enemies you'll encounter, and every 100 floors a powerful boss will appear to end your run if you're not properly prepared.



HyperLeague Heroes is an idle game, you can call the shots or sit back and watch your team make their own choices as they fight their way through Utopia's endless dungeons. At first your squad will be less capable of performing efficiently without your input, but after a bit of training and upgrading you’ll be able to take a backseat while they slay monsters and rack up tons of loot for your stash all on their own. You have the freedom to play the way you want.



HyperLeague Heroes features over 30 playable characters (and even more to come in free updates). Any enemy encountered can be recruited to your team. Fill your ranks with valiant heroes, merciless villains, or bloodthirsty monsters, and upgrade them to create the ultimate unstoppable team. Certain fighters are only available at specific times of day or days of the week, so each time you log in there may be new companions awaiting you.



Valuable treasures can be found in the deepest corners of dungeons, waiting to be claimed by powerful warriors. Legendary gear and resources to upgrade your base and create new fighters are yours to gather should you be able to defeat the monsters roaming around every floor. Unlike in other games there isn't a set list of predefined equipment in HyperLeague Heroes. Here gear has randomly generated stats and perks so there are countless variations you can find while dungeon crawling.



During your excursions you may come across Fusion Gems, a rare type of loot that allows you to merge two of your warriors together to create an even stronger fighter with boosted stats and special moves that they usually wouldn't be able to learn. Fusing certain characters may sometimes even result in a special hybrid character that can't be unlocked normally.



Each hero, villain, and monster in HyperLeague Heroes is fully upgradable, as is your team's base. Boosting your warrior's fighting potential and having a fully staffed and properly equipped base will give your squad the edge it needs to make it to the farthest reaches of each dungeon and conquer the final trial - a fight against a malevolent deity that wishes to wipe humanity from existence.

data.short_description: Recruit. Loot. Upgrade. Battle. Assemble a team of heroes, villains, and monsters and delve into the endless dungeons of Utopia to face off against waves of enemies in Siphon Shock's idle RPG. Issue commands to your squad directly or sit back and watch them fight and explore on their own.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required for login bonuses and recruiting certain characters.
